DIV1.P: A HERMIT'S TALE: RECORDED BY HIS OWN HAND, AND FOUND IN HIS CELL.

Q.L: There oft is found an Avarice in Grief;
And the wan Eye of Sorrow loves to gaze
Upon the secret Hoard of treasur'd Woes.

DIV1.P: LONDON: PRINTED FOR T. CADELL, IN THE STRAND. M.DCC.LXXXVII.

DIV1.HEAD: RICHARD BRINSLEY SHERIDAN, Esq.
DIV1.P: EQUALLY induced by a just admiration of your talents, and a grateful sense of the distinction your praise has given to those you were pleased to find in me, permit me to solicit your further indulgence to this little production; and be assured, its greatest value in my eyes is, that it serves to convey those ac∣knowledgments, with which I have the honour to remain,

CLOSER.SIGNED: Your most obliged, Obedient humble servant, SOPHIA LEE.
